channel.title: Helps on Feather TS
channel.description: Recent content in Helps on Feather TS

item.title: Help
item.description: IE11 support Feather-ts comes without old browser support. However it does work with IE11, if polyfills are provided. You will need es6 shims, Promise, Fetch and CustomEvent polyfills. Bindings and DOM writes Feather has no virtual dom, but since the templates are logic less the dom writes are optimized in place. You get maximum performance without the overhead of diffing a parts of the DOM tree. Because of that feather plays nicely with others and doesn’t care if the DOM is modified by external scripts.
